title: Brand Identity Design
shortDescription: A complete brand identity system including logo, typography, and color palette.
description: This branding project focused on creating a strong and memorable identity for a startup. It included logo design, typography guidelines, color system, and brand usage rules to ensure consistency across all platforms.

title: E-Commerce Website UI/UX
shortDescription: A modern and user-friendly UI design for an e-commerce platform.
description: Designed a clean and engaging shopping experience with intuitive navigation, product filters, and responsive layouts. The focus was on usability and visual hierarchy to drive conversions.

title: Creative Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A portfolio website designed to showcase creative works and projects.
description: This portfolio design emphasizes storytelling and minimal design principles. It features interactive galleries, smooth transitions, and an elegant layout tailored for designers and artists.

title: Mobile Banking App UI
shortDescription: A sleek and modern mobile app design for digital banking.
description: The mobile banking app focuses on a secure yet user-friendly experience. Features include account overview, quick transfers, and payment tracking. The UI was designed with simplicity and trust in mind.

title: Illustration Collection
shortDescription: A series of digital illustrations exploring modern lifestyle themes.
description: This collection includes over 20 illustrations created for marketing campaigns, editorial content, and digital products. Each piece was designed to convey emotion, storytelling, and vibrant aesthetics.

title: UI Kit for Designers
shortDescription: A comprehensive UI kit with reusable components for web and mobile projects.
description: The UI Kit contains 80+ customizable components including buttons, forms, modals, and navigation elements. Built with accessibility and scalability in mind, it helps designers speed up the design process.
